title: [SOLVED] S+ Invasion Reward?
body: I'm a bit dumb, possibly. I bit slow, maybe. I finished my last mission (S) with a S+ and I got rewarded the tokens and also it said something about a star guardian champion? I don't know exactly what it means, I can't find where I actually got anything besides the tokens. Anyone know what it meant?

replies.body:
You might be thinking about the Legendary Guardian Summon Icon! Check your icons for this one and let me know if you see it.

https://i.gyazo.com/b6b10bd33640404518506590a0b6c43e.png
I recently just got an s+ in this game mode, but i still didnt get the icon.
Ah, thank you! I found it.
